column5: My apologies to any who may have been offened by my thread....I guess maybe it got a little out of hand? I'll try not to touch on subjects that are so sensitive from now on. Please, no comments, just accept my apologies....Thanks!
The new lake trout regs are a touchy subject to allot of locals. Give it 5-10 years and they should be back up *WITH* bigger and better populations than ever!
